body: Boggard rangers stalk silently through the swamps.
name: Boggard Rangers

sections.special_attacks: combat style (archery), favored enemy (reptilian humanoids +2), terrifying croak (DC 12)
sections.other_gear: +1 studded leather, morningstar, mwk composite longbow (+4 Str), cloak of resistance +1, 267 gp
sections.feats: Endurance, Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, Toughness, Weapon Focus (composite longbow)
sections.special_qualities: favored terrain (swamp +2), hold breath, swamp stride, track +1, wild empathy +2
sections.name: Boggard Hunter
sections.skills: Acrobatics +5 (+21 when jumping), Knowledge (nature) +5, Perception +14, Stealth +8 (+16 in swamps), Survival +8, Swim +12

sections.ac: 19, touch 12, flat-footed 18 (+4 armor, +1 deflection, +1 Dex, +3 natural)
sections.special_attacks: combat style (two-weapon), favored enemy (dragons +2, humans +4), terrifying croak (DC 12)
sections.other_gear: +1 studded leather, +1 handaxes (2), javelins (3), cloak of resistance +1, ring of protection +1, 360 gp
sections.feats: Double Slice, Endurance, Improved Critical (handaxe), Improved Initiative, Improved Two-Weapon Fighting, Toughness, Two-Weapon Fighting, Weapon Focus (handaxe)
sections.special_qualities: favored terrain (swamp +2), hold breath, hunter's bond (companions), swamp stride, track +3, wild empathy +6, woodland stride
sections.name: Boggard Stalker
sections.skills: Acrobatics +5 (+21 when jumping), Climb +9, Handle Animal +4, Knowledge (nature) +5, Perception +18, Stealth +14 (+22 in swamps), Survival +14, Swim +17
sections.combat_gear: potion of barkskin, potion of cure moderate wounds, potion of invisibility
